Text: RE Your message was received KMMCKMPST Thank you for contacting Columbia House We appreciate you notifying us you wish to return a shipment Before a postage paid return label can be sent additional information is needed Please provide the title of each selection involved the reason for the return replacement instructions and your elevendigit membership number Upon receipt of your reply the matter will be given our prompt attention You can be assured of receiving only those selections you wish to purchase by the correct use of your selection card Although you are not required to purchase the automatic selection of the month you must respond prior to the date printed on the card If we are notified before the specific date the current selection will not be automatically shipped You may call tollfree or respond online at You may call tollfree to obtain information concerning your account You may also visit our website at wwwcolumbiahousecom or fax us at Please let us know if you have any further questions Sincerely Hans Steinman Customer Service Original Message Follows Two days have gone and past manty times sice I requested the procedure for returning DVDs from your company that I did not order nor desire Please have a representitive call me or email quickly If you do not I shall take further action due to your company charging me for product that I have not requested Don Baughman Original Message From dvd ENRON Sent Saturday October PM To Baughman Jr Don Subject Your message was received KMMCKM Message Receipt Confirmation Thank you for contacting us Message Reference Number Subject Returns Received PM We appreciate your patience were making every effort to respond to your email as soon as possible Due to the volume of email messages we receive please allow business days for a response should one be necessary Thanks again Customer Service This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Your message was received KMMCKMPST Message Receipt Confirmation Thank you for contacting us Message Reference Number Subject RE Your message was received KMMCKM Received AM We appreciate your patience were making every effort to respond to your email within business days However during peak times it may take as long as business days for a response should one be necessary Thanks again Customer Service
